Beyond Approach

For each of the following boxes, your goal is to guess the value of the function at the given input (e.g. for the first box, you want to find the value of \(f\) evaluated at \(x=2\)). You can use the text box to ask for the function's evaluation at any value except the input \(x\) (Note that numbers will be rounded to ten decimal places). This activity is meant to accompany this handout.

\(f(2)=?\)

\(g(0.5)=?\)

\(h(-1)=?\)

\(p(2)=?\)

\(q(1)=?\)

\(r(0)=?\)
